REGISTER__CGU_SUMMARY: We are committed to protecting the privacy of your personal information that Mahali uses. We conduct regular audits to secure your data. At all times you can request access to and/or rectification and/or deletion of your data.

ORDER__SHOW_CASHBACK_EXPLANATION:
{cashback} {currency} cashback for each Mahali order paid with Orange Money in Ivory Coast.
Offer valid for any payment from 2000 FCFA and within the limit of 3 times per week. The cashback is transferred to your Orange Money account.
